long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access multiple web dictionaries, ChatGPT, Google Translate, and more directly from the Chrome Side Panel with SidePal. 

Seamlessly integrated into Chrome, SidePal provides a streamlined and efficient way to enhance your language skills and boost productivity. 

Discover how Chrome's latest feature can transform your learning experience and simplify your daily tasks.

Key Features:

1. Instant Word Lookup: Double-click any word on a web page to instantly look it up in SidePal.
2. Comprehensive Dictionary Access: Explore multiple dictionaries for any language, ensuring a thorough understanding.
3. Customizable Shortcuts: Tailor keyboard shortcuts and configurations to fit your workflow.
4. Word History & Ratings: Keep track of your word history and rate words for personalized learning.

Beside, it's all open-source: https://github.com/pnlpal/dictionariez

Note: SidePal is derived from Dictionariez and serves as a lighter version of the original. For the full range of features and enhanced functionality, we recommend trying Dictionariez: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/dictionariez-your-diction/diojcfpekhhnndfmggknljpnfpcccbhc
